messages.content: And if you were wondering why we are Mad Over Donuts, you better be there and witness it all. Come join in the madness, come celebrate a delicious Donut Day today; only with Mad Over Donuts. Get your favorite Donuts only at Rs. 25 each. T & C apply.

If mangoes make you drool, here's your chance to grab as many as you can!

Mad Over Donuts introduces exotic new mango flavours with "Mango Mojo"

Enjoy Centre Of Perfection, Supermango, Lil' Drops of Mango, Yellow Jello and especially the savory flavor - Mango Mazaa.
